features: EXPERIENCE THE BENEFITS OF HEMP SEEDS: 100% Natural Hemp Seed Oil is rich in omega-6 and omega-3 fatty acids, enabling it to soothe atopic dermatitis, and limit oil production, so your skin will look and feel extraordinary.

EXOTIC AND EXCITING: This luxurious body cream is scented with Green Tea and Pears, which will leave an alluring, romantic aroma on your skin. The smell is not too heavy, and since it contains no harsh chemicals, it will leave behind no residue.

REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN: Acai Berry and Goji Berry combine with an essential extract blend that will balance, revitalize, and refresh your body from head to toe. It will help stimulate skin with regenerating ingredients.

ENRICHED MOISTURIZER: Our exotic lotions contain Vitamins A, C, E, and B5, which will protect your skin from natural and environmentally triggered oxidants and elements. Your skin will feel nourished and healthy with these rich, conditioning creams.

NATURAL INGREDIENTS, NATURAL RESULTS: Hempz moisturizers contain no parabens, gluten, and are THC-free. They are 100% Pure Natural Hemp Seed Oil, and they are 100% Vegan. Alleviate eczema, winter drying, flaking, and dry hands and feet.
body.description: Hempz Exotic green Tea & Asian pear herbal Body Moisturizer, Hempz Exotic green Tea & Asian pear herbal Body Moisturizer helps skin feel refreshed, revitalized and balanced. Enriched with 100% pure Natural Hemp Seed Oil. Paraben-free, gluten-free, 100% vegan, THC-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Lotion/Great Smell & Non-Greasy
reviews.reviewText: I originally tried this lotion from the person who cuts my hair. I bought a bottle and went through it quickly. I have since bought many bottles of this product, all with different scents. This is one of my favorite scents so far. The best part is that it is not greasy like other lotions. I accidently got some on a shirt sleeve and changed the shirt because it had a wet spot. When I was ready to launder the shirt, the wet spot was GONE!!!!I happen to have neuropathy in my feet and this lotion works better than any of the other lotions I have used that are specifically made for diabetics or people with neuropathy. You have to take care of your feet every day and this is by far the best lotion to use. Feet stay soft and smooth all the time. The fact that it is non-greasy means I can put it on my feet and immediately put on my socks and shoes. And, the scent lasts and lasts. also, I put this on my feet when I go to bed and can keep my feet under the covers because it is non-greasy and does not stain my bedding. By the way, there is an Age Defying lotion from Hempz that I have. Great to put on the face as it is not greasy either. Try that one, too!!!! I am definitely a fan of this product, no matter what the scent and will continue to buy it before I run out of it! Can't live without it now!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good on my skin!
reviews.reviewText: Great fragrance! Excellent absorption! Get compliments every day I use this lotion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a Christmas present for my son. Have purchased before, reason buying again. Great moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again in different scent
reviews.reviewText: I like this brand of lotion as it does moisturize well and I have had no bad side effects, I.e., rashes, itching. I did not particularly like the scent though and would not buy again. I would, however, buy the product in a different scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Favorite body lotion brand!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love Hempz body lotions. I have tried so many different scents. This scent smells really good, but It is kind of strong. I prefer light scents that aren't overpowering to my nose. Imma go buy a new fall scent from Ulta very soon! Is but from here but don't know if they are selling the new HempZ fall scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Part of a birthday gift for my D in-law… she loved the fragrance; always loves the lotion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice lotion
reviews.reviewText: Have used quite a while. Not greasy. Goes on easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected - Anti Aging
reviews.reviewText: I had been using the green tea version of this brand for maybe a year. (Which I loved.) I switched to the anti-aging one to try something new. I wasn't sure if this was the generic ‘flavor’ or if it was a fancy one - but I love it so much more than the green one! 😍It smells kinda like baby powder or something, but it’s pleasant and only lasts maybe twenty minutes. So you won’t have to worry about having any aromas from this.It’s *very* thick and creamy! 🤤 Lathers on really well and makes my skin softer than anything else I’ve ever used…! And the crazy part is it isn’t even just the oils in the lotion that make my skin soft. Even after I shower it off my skin is genuinely healthier than it ever has been in my adult life. 🤯 It also helps any small wounds heal rapidly. (I have cats that sometimes accidentally leave scratches when they’re anxious, and I sometimes get blemishes.)I’ve already recommended this lotion to all my friends and family. 😇
I love this scent, the quality was exactly as expected. I usually purchase in store, but I haven’t been near anywhere that sells this in a while so I ordered online. It is exactly the same.

reviews.reviewTitle: La amo con todo mi ser
reviews.reviewText: Es la mejor crema que he probado en mi vida (junto con la amarilla) y huelen de-li-cio-so. Super super recomendadas para la humectación e hidratación de la piel ✨ (la verde es mucho mas acuosa que la amarilla que es mas densa)
This is the very best if you have dry flaky skin.Can not believe the difference since using this.Very pleased .
Je recommande sa sens très bon
